title: mRemoteNG.appSettings - Consider moving to AppData Roaming
author: david-dell
body_snippet:
**Issue**

Unable to launch mRemoteNG if build is copied to C:\Program Files\..... and then running as a user that does not have **write** access to said folder. Issue appears to be due to the applied wanting to write to **mRemoteNG.appSettings** within the same folder as the executable.

**Solution (Possible)?**

Consider moving the **mRemoteNG.appSettings** file so it is loaded from AppData Roaming (similar to connection files), rather than within the same folder as the executable.
